name: The Amityville Horror
author: Jay Anson
description: A real possessed house drives a family crazy and causes strange happenings. They had learned of the house's past, and the murders that were in it. However, they ignored it. This is a true story from years ago. Let me warn you may not like what you read. Reader discretion is advised.

name: The Picture of Dorian Gray
author: Oscar Wilde
description: This classic twisting tale all starts with a portrait of a beautiful young man, Dorian Gray.

name: The Many Pieces of Me
author: Heather Semon
description: After reading through this book, you will understand why writing is so important. You will be able to write all about yourself after reading through this book.

name: SUCCESS for Teens
author: Jeff Olson
description: Tis book helps teens embrace eight principles that will allow them to shpae the futures they want. Also it directs them toward a path that enables them to achieve their goals.

name: Graphing: Slope-Intercept Form
author: Karen Cameron
description: This is a short book about graphing lines written in slope-intercept form. It is meant as a reference for deeper study in Algebra. I hope you find it useful.

name: Faces of Nature
author: Suresh Babu Palani
description: This book is a collection of 'Haiku' poems that depicts the different faces of nature (sweet, romantic and harsh faces). I hope you will enjoy them. Best regards, Suresh Babu Palani.

name: Lucky Guy
author: Scott Wampler
description: Man suspected of murder has to prove himself innocent.

name: How to Survive A Horror Movie
author: Chant'e Francis
description: The Guide book on how to survive a scary movie, reading this will increase your chances of survival and provide intense amusement.

name: How To Accomplish Anything You Want In Life
author: Michael Collier
description: Steps to assist anyone how to accomplish their goals.
